title: Change Investment Strategy
description: A client's risk tolerance has decreased, and they want to move from a 'Growth' to a 'Balanced' investment strategy.

tasks.description: Discuss the implications of changing strategy with the client, including potential tax consequences.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains the effects of the change.

tasks.description: Update the client's investment profile and target asset allocation in the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent changes the client's profile to 'Balanced' with a new target of 50% stocks / 50% bonds.

tasks.description: Generate a set of trades to align the portfolio with the new strategy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates the necessary trades to sell stocks and buy bonds to meet the new target.
